newsitem.title: KENYA: Strong demand at Kenya tea auction.
newsitem.headline: Strong demand at Kenya tea auction.

text.p: Strong demand from Britain and the Middle East pushed up prices of Brighter BP1s and mediums at the weekly tea auction, auction officials said on Monday.

Brighter BP1s were up to five U.S. cents dearer while mediums gained between six and 12 cents. Brighter PF1s were firm to five cents above last week's levels, while coloury mediums moved up by 5-10 cents and sometimes more.
In the secondary catalogues, Fannings were firm to dearer with brighter coloury sorts and BMFs selling at a premium.
